CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 7,1959, page A3, reads: "GPIL Membership Drive - Officers and workers in membership drive currently being staged by the Greater Pittsburgh Improvement League, Inc., are shown as they mapped plans and made reports in a meeting at the Greene Hearth, 7135 Bennett St., recently. The membership drive will continue until Nov. 20. Next meeting of the GPIL will be held at the Green Hearth from 4 to 6 P.M., Nov. 8. Left to right, back row: Thomas Daly, William Crawford, Mrs. Alberta Porter, Eugene Woods, Mrs. Sales, George A. Meyer and Ned Parker. Middle row: Mrs. Anna Sales, A.C. Holloway, Edward Love, Kenneth Davin and Robert Morris. Taking notes is Miss Irene M. Roberts. Standing: Manford Sales, president. Far right row: Aaron McCorvery, Carl Terry and Mrs. Earsley Kincaid. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group at Greater Pittsburgh Improvement League membership drive, back row from left: Thomas Daly, William Crawford, Alberta Porter, Eugene Woods, Mrs. Sales, George A. Meyer, Ned Parker; middle row: Anna Sales, A. C. Holloway, Edward Love, Kenneth Davin, Robert Morris; Irene M. Roberts taking notes; standing: president Manford Sales; far right row: Aaron McCorvery, Carl Terry, and Earsley Kincaid, gathered in Greene Hearth
